title: NY Times Style Mag: Typeface?
content:
Hello all.  
Looking to identify the serif face used on/offline.  
Any thoughts?

Sentence Case and Caps.

I thought it might have be PMC Caecilia (Caps), but was proven wrong.

I’m going to upload a screen grab of the website to help.

Thank you much.

Jason

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828001923im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/nytimes_style_web_5408.jpg)

 [‹ Habib's font](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828001923/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42373 "Go to previous forum topic") [le petit prince font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828001923/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42360 "Go to next forum topic")
author: j25_jones
